channel.title: Does anybody in Auxy use vocals?
channel.description: I‚Äôll be putting vocals in my souncloud music soon and I was just wondering if anyone else in Auxy uses vocals.^^

item.title: Does anybody in Auxy use vocals?
item.dc:creator: GioMakyo
item.description:
Ford shorter vocal phrases, I use samples within Auxy, which works fine. At up to eight seconds per sample and eight samples per kit, you can cram a lot in there. For longer vocals, I import my finished mix into Auria and add the vocals there.

Read full topic

item.title: Does anybody in Auxy use vocals?
item.dc:creator: Goxenar
item.description:
You‚Äôre awesome man, that means a lot!

@Katki If you‚Äôre using Auxy to import short vocal samples, it will work quite well. If you‚Äôre planning on adding a minute or so worth of lyrics, I would suggest using GarageBand. Simply import the Auxy created instrumental into GarageBand and add a mic‚Äô over the instrumental. That‚Äôs what I do.
